summary: UCPN (Maoist) Chairman Pushpa Kamal Dhal has lashed out at CPN-UML Chairman KP Sharma Oli. “Oli is not the contractor or the king of this nation,” said leader Dahal, talking to media persons after meeting Constituent Assembly (CA) Chairman Subash Nembang at CA building in Nayabaneshwor, Kathmandu. On Saturday, the UCPN (Maoist) leaders walked out of the “decisive meeting” convened at the prime minister’s official residence in Baluwater right after UML leader Oli delivered his speech. The UCPN (Maoist) leaders were enraged after Oli said the new constitution should be drafted through procedure if the parties cannot forge agreement.
title: dahal-lashes-out-oli
